plot outline: Meshtru story is based on the real life incident. In the late 70's a corporation school teacher returning home in the afternoon finds a rowdy troubling the passerby. The teacher stops him from further action and tames the rowdy for better life.
title: Meshtru
plot: _Meshtru_ (qv) story is based on the real life incident. In the late 70's a corporation school teacher returning home in the afternoon finds a rowdy troubling the passerby. The teacher stops him from further action and tames the rowdy for better life.
